casebody.data:
HAMPTON
v.
CUMBERLAND COUNTY 60PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 14, 2018 Robert A. Hasty, Jr., Attorney at Law, for Cumberland County Garris Neil Yarborough, Attorney at Law, Fayetteville, for Hampton, David, et al.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 14th of November 2018 by Respondent:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of November 2018."

Respondent shall have up to and including the 4th day of December 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
